titles.title: Kaytlynn Noggle Federal Life Insurance Equity Act
To amend title 5, United States Code, to make stillborn children eligible for optional life insurance coverage.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 3/11/2010--Introduced. Kaytlynn Noggle Federal Life Insurance Equity Act - Includes a stillborn child within the definition of a "family member" of an eligible individual for purposes of federal employee life insurance provisions.
